title: Bird (mathematical artwork)
summary: Bird, also known as A Bird in Flight refers to bird-like mathematical artworks that are introduced by mathematical equations.[1][2][3][4][5][6][7] A group of these figures are created by combing through tens of thousands of computer-generated images.
